definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: A valuable road map for understanding and healing cybersex addictions.
sentences.chinese: 一個網絡性愛的理解和治療吸毒成癮寶貴的路線圖。

sentences.english: He lined out the route for the sightseers.
sentences.chinese: 他給遊客們畫出了路線圖。

sentences.english: What's the future road map of Tasktop product?
sentences.chinese: Tasktop產品未來的路線圖如何？

sentences.english: It was time for us to evaluate our roadmap against the technology we were using.
sentences.chinese: 現在是時候對我們使用的技術路線圖作一個評估了。

sentences.english: What is the future road map of ROO project in terms of new features?
sentences.chinese: 在新特性方面，ROO項目未來的路線圖是怎樣的？

sentences.english: There are many different forms these roadmaps might take.
sentences.chinese: 這些路線圖可以有各種不同的形式。

sentences.english: Coté adds that roadmaps should be publicly available.
sentences.chinese: 古德補充道，路線圖也應該是公開的。

sentences.english: A: What's the roadmap of Amethyst?
The roadmap includes a measure of self-serving guff about the evils of shareholder democracy.
sentences.chinese: 有關股東民主弊病的利己廢話也赫然出現在路線圖中。

sentences.english: The whole route of the auto race.
sentences.chinese: 汽車拉力賽的這個路線圖。

sentences.english: They asked for road maps from the ETIM as they attempted to cross the border, Wu said.
sentences.chinese: 他們從東突分子手上拿到了路線圖來試圖穿過邊界。

sentences.english: We have an NIO-based server module on the roadmap.
sentences.chinese: 路線圖中包含了一個基於NIO的服務器模塊。

sentences.english: The roadmap includes expanding performance management offerings in that direction as well.
sentences.chinese: 我們的路線圖還包括在那個方向上增加性能管理產品。

sentences.english: InfoQ: What’s on the roadmap next?
sentences.chinese: 路線圖的下一步將會是什麼？

sentences.english: Steadily, Sasa suggests that you will route map printed on the invitation.
sentences.chinese: 穩妥起見，莎莎建議你將行車路線圖印在邀請函上。

sentences.english: A map of the three routes taken by migrating turtles.
sentences.chinese: 這是一張標有海龜遷徙三種路線圖的地圖。

definition: itinerary/route/political line (e.g. right revisionist road)/CL:條|条[tiao2]
to access/to transfer passengers between two railway lines
to drive a vehicle/movement of vehicles
